message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product which is tailored to meet your specific needs. I believe it will greatly enhance your business operations. Given its value, I propose an initial offer of $10000. This reflects not only the product's worth but also includes some added benefits and services. I look forward to your consideration.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product, but my budget allows me to pay no more than $8000 for it. I would like to make a counteroffer at this price.
